message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special price tailored just for you. Given its immense value to you at $15,000, I propose we make this transaction more accessible. My offer to you is to purchase the product for $12,000. This not only secures a significant saving for you but also allows me to maximize the value of my investment in the product. I believe this is a win-win situation for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
